list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small circular band, typically of precious metal and often set with one or more gemstones, worn on a finger as an ornament or a token of marriage, engagement, or authority.
an enclosed space, surrounded by seating for spectators, in which a sport, performance, or show takes place.
a group of people drawn together due to a shared interest or goal, especially one involving illegal or unscrupulous activity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the police had been investigating the drug ring
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cảnh sát đã điều tra vòng thuốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a set of elements with two binary operations, addition and multiplication, the second being distributive over the first and associative.
an act of causing a bell to sound, or the resonant sound caused by this.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was a ring at the door
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có một chiếc nhẫn ở cửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: surround (someone or something), especially for protection or containment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the courthouse was ringed with police
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tòa án đã bị cảnh sát

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make a clear resonant or vibrating sound.
(of a person's ears) be filled with a continuous buzzing or humming sound, especially as the aftereffect of a blow or loud noise.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he yelled so loudly that my eardrums rang
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh hét to lên đến nỗi màng nhĩ của tôi reo
